title: Kaitou! Pokemon 7
alternative_title: Phantom Thief! Pokémon 7 ; Kaitou! Pokémon 7 ; 怪盗!ポケモン7 ; The Mysterious Thief! Pokémon 7!
status: Phantom Thief! Pokémon 7 ; Kaitou! Pokémon 7 ; 怪盗!ポケモン7 ; The Mysterious Thief! Pokémon 7!
description:
Description :
        Pokemon Seven(a.k.a. Hiori) is a notorious theif. When his sister Lily is kidnapped by Team Galatic, Hiori goes on a mission to save Lily. Will Hiori and his partner, Lucario, be able to save to Lily?

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 5 : The Rescue Of Team Galactic
Vol.1 Chapter 2 : The Real Face Of Theft
Vol.1 Chapter 1 : Enter The Mysterious Thief Of Justice!
